name: Crowned Heads - Headley Grange - Hermoso No. 4
additionalNotes: Only a few years in existence, Crowned Heads is quickly building an impressive resume. And without a doubt, one of its highlights is Headley Grange. A smooth Ecuador Sumatra wrapper embraces rich, bold Nicaraguan long-fillers. Then, each cigar is gently box-pressed for a stunning presentation. The profile is medium to full-bodied emitting a buttery smooth nutty sweetness, that fuses nicely with coffee, nutmeg, and leather.
